Action.author: lesleyannj
Action.body: Status update 4 Mar - PR in for concurrency work. Continue refactoring of comms package.

Action.author: lesleyannj
Action.body: Status update 5 Mar - Concurrent PR merged. Refactoring of comms package with Fabric dev. Work started on error handling on grpc boundaries and better returns/message when multiple endorsements fail.

Action.author: lesleyannj
Action.body: Status update 8 Mar - PR submitted for adding details to Gateway protobuf - to allow delivery of better return message when multiple endorsements fail.
